Install shoulda-matchers

Update file Gemfile

Add 

   gem 'shoulda-matchers'

Becomes 

 group :test do
   gem 'database_cleaner'
   gem 'launchy'
   gem 'shoulda-matchers'
   gem 'valid_attribute'
 end
 

Update file Gemfile.lock

Add 

     shoulda-matchers (2.4.0)
       activesupport (>= 3.0.0)

Add 

   shoulda-matchers

Becomes 

     sdoc (0.3.20)
       json (>= 1.1.3)
       rdoc (~> 3.10)
     shoulda-matchers (2.4.0)
       activesupport (>= 3.0.0)
     slop (3.4.6)
     sprockets (2.10.0)
       hike (~> 1.2)
